decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall be Western Red timber cladding and the walls shall be rendered and painted white.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Existing Location Plan, Proposed Location Plan, OS Map, Flood Risk Assessment, 305-100-AL (02). dwg, 305-101-AL (02). dwg, 305-102-AL (02). dwg, 305-103-AL (02). dwg, 305-110-AL (02). dwg, 305-111-AL (02). dwg, 305-112-AL (02). dwg, 305-120-AL (02). dwg, 305-121-AL (02). dwg Received: 02 April 2013 Design & Access Statement Received: 04 April 2013 305-220-DT (07) R. 04 Received: 13 May 2013 305-140-AL (04). dwg R.06, 305-141-AL (04). dwg R.06, 305-142-AL (04). dwg R.06, 305-143-AL (04). dwg R.06, 305-150-AL (05). dwg R.06, 305-151-AL (05). dwg R.06, 305-152-AL (05). dwg R.06, 305-153-AL (05). dwg R.06 Received: 06 June 2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - The windows formed in the window on the rear elevation at first floor level of the extension shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of first floor rear extension, rendering of front and rear elevations, replacement of existing timber cladding and installation of 2 roof lights to the rear and 1roof light to the front of the house (NOTE AMENDED DESCRIPTION)
